text: {| |} RFA Eddybay (A107) was an Eddy class coastal tanker of the Royal Fleet Auxiliary. As with others of the class the ship had a short career and was stationed at Gibraltar for much of that time as a petrol carrier, spending three years at the colony in total. ==References== * Eddy-Class Coastal Tankers * Historical RFA Category:Tankers of the Royal Fleet Auxiliary Category:1951 ships
title: RFA Eddybay (A107)
